item.title: Email to McDonald’s executives about Allen & Overy
item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Allen & Overy Date sent: January 4, 2016 at 21:48 (China Standard Time) To: Steve Easterbrook, Gloria Santona <Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com>, Malcolm Hicks <Malcolm.Hicks@eu.mcd.com> Mr. Easterbrook, Ms. Santona, Mr. Hicks, Could you please let me know the name of the lawyer who is representing you at Allen & Overy? I’ve just tried to call them but I can’t get anyone without the right person’s name.
